clinical_study.brief_title: Pharmacodynamics, Pharmacokinetics, Safety and Tolerability of SHR3824 in Type 2 Diabetes Mellitus Patients
clinical_study.official_title: Pharmacodynamics, Pharmacokinetics, Safety and Tolerability of SHR3824 in Type 2 Diabetes Mellitus Patients

brief_summary.textblock: The purpose of this study is to evaluate the pharmacodynamics (PD), pharmacokinetics (PK), safety and tolerability following single and multiple oral doses of 5mg to 20 mg SHR3824 in Type 2 diabetes mellitus patients.
